translation.en: LAMECH: From Adam to Seth, from Seth to Enosh,
translation.zh: 亚当生了塞特 塞特生了以挪士

translation.en: Enosh to Kenan, Kenan to Mahalalel
translation.zh: 以挪士生了该南 该南生了玛勒列 再来是我的父亲 玛土撒拉 接着是我

translation.en: to my father, Methuselah, then to me.
translation.zh: 再来是我的父亲 玛土撒拉 接着是我

translation.en: Today, that birthright passes to you,
translation.zh: 今天开始由你来继承我们

translation.en: The Creator made Adam in His image,
translation.zh: 造物主按自己的形像创造了亚当

translation.en: and then placed the world in his care.
This is your work now. Your responsibility.
translation.zh: 现在开始就是你的责任了

translation.en: May you walk alongside The Creator in righteousness.
translation.zh: 愿你心存公义 与造物主同行

translation.en: YOUNG TUBAL-CAIN: The Shrine of Seth!
The ground is rich with tzohar.
This is The Creator's land. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 这是造物主的土地 你在做什么？

translation.en: My city withers and must be fed.
translation.zh: 我的城市正在败坏 需要资源

translation.en: He cursed us to struggle by the sweat of our brow to survive!
translation.zh: 他诅咒我们必须汗流浃背 才得以苟且偷生！

translation.en: Damned if I don't do everything it takes to do just that.
translation.zh: 所以我不择手段也要活下去

translation.en: This relic belongs to the descendants of Cain now.
translation.zh: 这片土地现在属于该隐的子孙

translation.en: The line of Seth ends here.

translation.zh: 是我们的了 开始挖！

translation.en: How they're attached to the ground?
translation.zh: 它们是不是都生长在地上？

translation.en: The wind takes their seeds and more flowers grow.
translation.zh: 风带走种子 让花不断生长

translation.en: We only collect what we can use, and what we need.
translation.zh: 我们只采集可用和所需的量
但对你来说可能是不幸

translation.en: You know how long it is since we ate meat?
translation.zh: 你知道我们有多久没吃肉吗？

translation.en: Since we even saw an animal?

translation.zh: 别这样 你想要什么？

translation.en: Why did they kill it? They eat them.
translation.zh: –他们为什么要杀它？ –吃它的肉

translation.en: They think it makes them stronger.
translation.zh: 他们以为这样可以变强壮
他们离我们越来越近了

translation.en: He had to see it sometime.
Perhaps He will finally make things right.
NAAMEH: Did He speak to you?
He's going to destroy the world.
NAAMEH: It's a long and dangerous journey for the boys. (BABY COOING)
translation.zh: 这段旅程对孩子们来说又长又危险

translation.en: How do you know your grandfather's still alive?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道你祖父还活着？
但我梦见了他住的山头

translation.en: We need to go and find out if he knows what we're to do.
translation.zh: 他可能知道我们该怎么做

translation.en: YOUNG HAM: Shem. Can you help me with this?
translation.zh: 闪 可以帮我的忙吗？

translation.en: We could take the boys and find a place to hide.
translation.zh: 我们可以带着孩子找个地方躲起来

translation.en: NOAH: Ham, let me show you how to do that.
we'll know we've got certain things we might need.
translation.zh: 这些东西就能派上用场
城市就在前面 我们不会走太近

translation.en: NOAH: We will not get too close.
YOUNG HAM: Is that a tzohar mine?
NOAH: It was once. Before they dug it all up.
translation.zh: 曾经是 但矿藏已经耗尽

translation.en: Do you think they're all dead?
They must have been scavenging here.
translation.zh: 他们一定是在这里扎营

translation.en: You're going to be all right, Ila.
He's going to hold your hand tight and he won't let go.
translation.zh: 他会紧握你的手 不会放开

translation.en: MAN: Up the hill! Hurry! Hurry!

translation.zh: 我们得走了 动作快

translation.en: NOAH: We have no choice. Hurry!
MAN 1: Hold, men! Hold! MAN 2: The giants!
translation.zh: 别过去！ 那里有巨人！

translation.en: Protect your mother, first and last.
translation.zh: 无论如何一定要保护妈妈

translation.en: We are to see Methuselah. My grandfather.
translation.zh: 我们是来见我的祖父玛土撒拉的

translation.en: A child of the old one?

translation.zh: 这可是人啊 咢 你忘了他们是怎么背叛造物主的吗？

translation.en: Do you forget how they betrayed The Creator?
translation.zh: 你忘了他们是怎么背叛造物主的吗？

translation.en: It is He who sends us!

translation.zh: 让它们在这里自生自灭

translation.en: I want my daddy to sing to me.
translation.zh: 我想要我爸爸唱歌给我听

translation.en: You know, I, too, lost my father when I was very young.
translation.zh: 我跟你一样很小的时候就失去了父亲

translation.en: There's a song he used to sing me sometimes when I couldn't sleep.
translation.zh: 每次我睡不着他都会唱一首歌

translation.en: Would you like to hear it?
♪ To wrap you in His sheltering wings

translation.zh: 这辈子都无法生儿育女了

translation.en: If the fever doesn't take her,
translation.zh: 但如果她能熬过这场高烧

translation.en: Watchers have learned to fear men.
translation.zh: 守望者很清楚人类的可怕

translation.en: YOUNG HAM: Then why are you helping us?
translation.zh: 那你为什么要帮助我们？

translation.en: The Creator formed us on the second day.
translation.zh: 造物主在第二天创造了我们

translation.en: The day He made the heavens.
We watched over Adam and Eve.
Saw their frailty and their love.
translation.zh: 看见他们的弱点和爱 也目睹他们堕落 并怜悯他们

translation.en: And then we saw their fall. And we pitied them.
translation.zh: 也目睹他们堕落 并怜悯他们

translation.en: We were not stone then, but light.
translation.zh: 那时我们不是石头 而是光芒

translation.en: It was not our place to interfere.
Yet we chose to try and help mankind.
And when we disobeyed The Creator,
translation.zh: 因此违背了造物主的旨意

translation.en: We were encrusted by your world.
translation.zh: 让我们被你们的世界包覆

translation.en: Rock and mud shackled our fiery glow.
translation.zh: 火焰般的光芒被岩石和泥巴遮盖

translation.en: Still, we taught mankind all we knew of Creation.
translation.zh: 但我们仍将所有知识传授给人

translation.en: they rose from the dust, became great and mighty.
translation.zh: 人从尘土中崛起 变得伟大且不可一世

translation.en: But then they turned our gifts to violence.
translation.zh: 然后把我们的恩惠转为暴行
只有一人保护我们 你的祖父玛土撒拉

translation.en: We were hunted. Most of us killed.
Those who lived were left prisoners in these stony shells,
translation.zh: 活下来的则继续困在石壳里
被放逐在这片贫脊的大地上

translation.en: We begged The Creator to take us home.
translation.zh: 我们恳求造物主带我们回家

translation.en: you claim that you have heard His call.
translation.zh: 你却说你听见了他的呼唤

translation.en: A man? When it is men who broke the world.
translation.zh: 就凭你一个人？ 人可是破坏世界的元凶

translation.en: and I see a glimmer of Adam again.
The man I came to help.
YOUNG HAM: Why can't I come?
Because I need you to look after Mother.
(WHISPERING) And you look after your father.
This is your great-grandfather. Show him respect.
translation.zh: 这是你的曾祖父 要尊敬他

translation.en: I think you must have your mother's looks, not your father's.
translation.zh: 你一定长得像妈妈 不像爸爸
我问你 世界上你最喜欢什么？

translation.en: what do you like most in the world?

translation.zh: 莓果 莓果 当然了

translation.en: What can compete with fresh, ripe berries? Nothing.
translation.zh: 没有什么比鲜甜的莓果更好吃了

translation.en: Yes, it's been so long I can barely remember the taste of them.
translation.zh: 太久没吃我都快忘了它们的滋味

translation.en: Ah, tell me, did you bring me any?
translation.zh: 你有没有带一些来给我吃？
好吧 可能以后还有机会

translation.en: You must be tired. It's a long way up here.
translation.zh: 爬这么长一段路 你一定累了

translation.en: What we need to discuss is not for boys.
translation.zh: 我们要讨论的话题不适合孩子

translation.en: Before he walked on, my father Enoch told me that one day,
translation.zh: 我父亲以诺临终前曾告诉我

translation.en: if man continued in his ways,
The Creator would annihilate this world.
translation.zh: 造物主将摧毁这个世界

translation.en: So what I saw is true?
translation.zh: 所以我看到的即将成真？ 所有生命都将因人的恶行而被抹杀？

translation.en: All life blotted out because of what man has done?
translation.zh: 所有生命都将因人的恶行而被抹杀？

translation.en: Noah, you must trust that He speaks in a way that you can understand.
translation.zh: 他一定会用你能了解的方法让你知道

translation.en: So you tell me. Can this destruction be averted?
translation.zh: 告诉我 这场灾难是否能够避免？

translation.en: Why send me if there's nothing I can do to stop it?
translation.zh: 如果我阻挡不了 为什么还要我来？

translation.en: Well, perhaps He simply sends you here to share a cup of tea
translation.zh: 他可能只是要你来… …跟我这老头喝杯茶

translation.en: So, is that all you saw?
The fires of destruction on this place?
translation.zh: 除了这里以及毁灭世界的烈焰？

translation.en: My father said it would be fire.
I saw water. Death by water.
translation.zh: 我看见了水 水带来死亡

translation.en: I just didn't see what it was.
Well, perhaps there is more for you to see.
translation.zh: 或许你还有东西没看见

translation.en: Did He not send you here to drink a cup of tea with an old man?
translation.zh: 他难道不是要你来跟老头喝杯茶吗？

translation.en: YOUNG SHEM: She was the only one moving. METHUSELAH: Was she hurt badly?
translation.zh: –她是唯一活着的人 –她伤得很重吗？

translation.en: YOUNG SHEM: She had a big cut on her belly.
translation.zh: 她的肚皮上有个很大的伤口

translation.en: Mother helped and I held her hand.
translation.zh: 妈妈帮她 我则握住她的手

translation.en: That must have made her feel safe.
It separates the foul from the pure. The wicked from the innocent.
translation.zh: 将肮脏与纯洁隔离 邪恶与无辜分开

translation.en: And that which sinks from that which rises.
translation.zh: 恶则向下沉沦 善则向上提升

translation.en: He chose you for a reason.
YOUNG HAM: You can't get me!
He's helped me see what we're here to do.
translation.zh: 他让我看清楚我们来这里的目的

translation.en: Men are going to be punished for what they've done to this world.
translation.zh: 人将因其所作所为而受罚

translation.en: And our family has been chosen for a great task.
We've been chosen to save the innocent.
translation.zh: 我们被选来解救无辜的生命
它们为什么是无辜的？ 因为它们仍依照伊甸园的方式过活

translation.en: Because they still live as they did in the Garden.
translation.zh: 因为它们仍依照伊甸园的方式过活

translation.en: And we need to save enough of them to start again.
translation.zh: 我们必须拯救足够的动物 让生命重新开始

translation.en: I guess we get to start again, too.
We get to start again in a new and better world.
translation.zh: 在更美好的新世界里重新来过

translation.en: NOAH: A great flood is coming.
The waters of the heavens will meet the waters of the earth.
translation.zh: 天上的水和地上的水将汇合

translation.en: We build a vessel to survive the storm.
translation.zh: 我们要造船来度过风暴

translation.en: OG: He is a child of the old one!
There is work to do. Help us.
translation.zh: 我们被赋予任务 帮助我们

translation.en: We tried to help your kind once.
And we lost everything because of you!
translation.zh: 但你们害我们失去一切！

translation.en: We can save what is left. We can serve Him again.
translation.zh: 我们可以拯救其余生命 再次服侍他
你们都是背信忘义的蛇！

translation.en: See, that's a boy one and that's a girl one.
translation.zh: 你瞧 一只公的和一只母的
风暴过后 它们会成为父母

translation.en: they'll become a mother and a father.
translation.zh: 风暴过后 它们会成为父母 孵出来的雏鸟将在大地上生生不息

translation.en: And the hatchlings will spread right across the world.
translation.zh: 孵出来的雏鸟将在大地上生生不息

translation.en: We have to be gentle with them
translation.zh: 我们必须温柔对待它们

translation.en: and we have to be protective.

translation.zh: 万一它们有了什么闪失

translation.en: that would be a small piece of Creation lost forever.
translation.zh: 创世的一小部分就会永远消失

translation.en: All of these innocent creatures are now in our care.
translation.zh: 这些无辜的动物现在交付我们手中

translation.en: It's our job to look after them.
translation.zh: 我们的工作就是照顾它们

translation.en: You have Mother, Shem has Ila.
translation.zh: 你有妈妈 闪有伊拉
谁会是我们的另一半？ 你看见他造林让我们有木材建方舟

translation.en: Did you see how He made the forest to give us wood for the ark?
translation.zh: 你看见他造林让我们有木材建方舟

translation.en: hasn't He sent everything we need?
translation.zh: 他不是给了我们所需的东西吗？

translation.en: All that creeps, all that crawls, all that slithers.
translation.zh: 所有在地上爬行蠕动的都会来

translation.en: No one will hurt this boy.
translation.zh: 谁都不准伤害这个男孩
我是土拔尔该隐 你认识我吗？

translation.en: My father says there can be no king in The Creator's garden.
translation.zh: 我父亲说造物主的花园里不能有王

translation.en: Do not take my best soldier.
translation.zh: 别带走我最优秀的士兵

translation.en: Look at his hand on that weapon.
I believe he is something of mine.
translation.zh: 我相信他是我们的一分子

translation.en: No, he gave it to me. Do what I tell you.
When I heard talk of miracles, I dismissed them.
translation.zh: 有人说奇迹发生 我斥为无稽之谈

translation.en: But then I saw the birds with my own eyes, flying here,
translation.zh: 但我亲眼看见鸟群飞来

translation.en: There isn't anything for you here. No?
translation.zh: –这里没有东西可以给你 –是吗？
这块土地 这片森林

translation.en: Did you really think you could protect yourself from me in that?
translation.zh: 你真的以为躲在那里就能逃离我？
那不是为了逃离你而盖的

translation.en: to hold the innocent when The Creator sends
translation.zh: …会在造物主以洪水清除世上罪恶时

translation.en: his deluge to wipe out the wicked from this world.
The Creator does not care what happens in this world.
translation.zh: 造物主才不在乎这世界变成怎么样

translation.en: Nobody has heard from Him since He marked Cain.
translation.zh: 他标记该隐后便无声无息
我们无依无靠 是被抛弃的孩子

translation.en: to struggle by the sweat of our brow to survive.
translation.zh: 必须汗流浃背才得以苟且偷生 所以我不择手段也要活下去

translation.en: Damned if I don't do everything it takes to do just that. (SPITS)
translation.zh: 所以我不择手段也要活下去

translation.en: BOTH: Damned if I don't take what I want.
I am the son of Lamech!

translation.zh: 塞特的第八代子孙！ 回到该隐为你们建立的城市去！

translation.en: Return to your cities of Cain!
translation.zh: 回到该隐为你们建立的城市去！

translation.en: Know we have all been judged!
I have men at my back,
and you stand alone and defy me?
translation.zh: 凭你一个人就想抵抗我？

translation.en: His minions, uh, they're with you?
translation.zh: 他的奴才跟你站在同一阵线？

translation.en: Perhaps casting us out of Paradise was not enough. Perhaps,
translation.zh: 或许把我们逐出伊甸园还不够

translation.en: He returns to finish us off.
translation.zh: 他要回来把我们解决掉

translation.en: I will ride the storm in that ship of yours.
translation.zh: …我会乘上你那艘船度过风暴

translation.en: There is no escape for you and your kind.
translation.zh: 你和你的子民都无处可逃

translation.en: The land is dying. NOAH: Ham.
TUBAL-CAIN: The cities are dead. NOAH: Don't listen to him.
translation.zh: –城市已经凋零 –别再听他说了

translation.en: I'm not afraid of miracles, son of Lamech!
translation.zh: 我才不怕奇迹 拉麦之子！ 你现在拒绝我们少数人

translation.en: If you refuse my dozens now,
translation.zh: 你现在拒绝我们少数人
那就等着我带多数人回来！
他们真的会带更多人来吗？

translation.en: We need to finish as fast as we can.
translation.zh: 我们必须尽快建好方舟 大雨下得愈早愈好

translation.en: The sooner He sends the rain, the better.

translation.zh: 到时我们在里面就安全了
先是武器 再来是人

translation.en: Feed only those that will fight.
translation.zh: 只有能战斗的人可以吃饭

translation.en: train them, and there is nothing they can't do.
translation.zh: 训练他们 让他们无所不能

translation.en: With an army, we can crush those giants.
translation.zh: 只要军队够强大 就可以击溃那些巨人

translation.en: MAN 1: Please, we're hungry! MAN 2: Give us meat. MAN 1: Our children are starving. MAN 3: Please help us!
translation.zh: 我们快饿死了！给我们肉！求求你！

translation.en: Do you think those men are going to attack us?
translation.zh: 那些人会来攻击我们吗？

translation.en: What do you think it'll be like?
I'm not sure there are words.
Whatever he's done or said, Shem is very fond of you.
translation.zh: 不管闪说了或做了什么 他都是喜欢你的
他应该建立自己的家庭

translation.en: I can't give any of that to him.
And I'm not going to deny him those things,
even if he wants me to.
translation.zh: 我也不会要他这么牺牲

translation.en: why would The Creator want a barren girl on His ark?
translation.zh: …造物主才不会让一个不孕的女孩… …待在他的方舟上

translation.en: When we first took you in,
translation.zh: 我们一开始收容你的时候

translation.en: I thought you were going to be a burden.
And I didn't want to see
translation.zh: 而且我不想再看见被这世界腐化的…

translation.en: anybody else ruined by this world.
translation.zh: 而且我不想再看见被这世界腐化的… …任何一个人
珍贵不已的礼物 千万别忘记这一点

translation.en: Just don't forget how precious a gift you are.
I know you'll be going to find wives for Ham and Japheth.
translation.zh: 我知道你会帮含和雅弗找到妻子

translation.en: You should find one for Shem, too.
MEAN UNCLE: Where do you think you're going? (SCREAMING)
WOMAN: Please, please don't take my baby!

translation.zh: 对不起 我们得填饱肚子！

translation.en: Don't take my baby! No, no, please will you stop him?
translation.zh: 别带走我的宝贝！快阻止他！

translation.en: MEAN UNCLE: Quit struggling! It'll be easier.
MAN: I have two girls! I have two girls to trade!
translation.zh: 我这里有两个女孩和你们交易！

translation.en: Take the girls! Give me the meat! Give it to me! (GIRLS SCREAMING)
NOAH: All of this should be inside by now.
translation.zh: 这些东西全都早该放进去了

translation.en: The storm is coming. What about our wives? Where are they?
translation.zh: –风暴要来了 –我们的妻子在哪？

translation.en: Did you not hear what I just said? But when are they coming?
translation.zh: –你没听见我的话吗？ –她们何时来？

translation.en: You said that The Creator would give us what we'll need.
translation.zh: 你说过造物主会给我们所需的东西

translation.en: You can't. How am I supposed to be a man?
You want me to stay a child!
I'm asking you to be a man and do what needs to be done.
translation.zh: 我现在要求你当个男人 做你该做的事

translation.en: NAAMEH: What are you doing, Noah?
translation.zh: 你这是做什么 诺亚？

translation.en: The wickedness is not just in them.

translation.zh: 闪忠心耿耿 雅弗宅心仁厚

translation.en: And Japheth lives only to please.
translation.zh: 雅弗只会讨好他人 我也没好到哪里去

translation.en: Is there anything you would not do,
translation.zh: 只要是为了那三个孩子

translation.en: good or bad, for those three boys?
translation.zh: 不管好事坏事都做得出来

translation.en: We would both choose to kill
in order to protect our children. Yes.
We were weak and we were selfish
to think we could set ourselves apart.
translation.zh: 还以为能和邪恶划清界线
你一点慈悲心都没有吗？

translation.en: The time for mercy has passed.
METHUSELAH: Did you bring me something?
Did Noah plant the seed I gave him?
translation.zh: 诺亚种了我给他的种子吗？

translation.en: And in all that forest there were no berries?
translation.zh: 那么大的森林里没有莓果吗？
闪说要带莓果来给我吃的

translation.en: Then why did you come here?
He leaves our boys with no one.
translation.zh: 他不让我们的儿子传宗接代

translation.en: Shem has Ila, but she's barren.
translation.zh: 闪有伊拉 但她不能生育

translation.en: There'll be no other wives, so
translation.zh: 我们家不会有其他妻子

translation.en: The Creator destroys this world because we corrupted it.
translation.zh: 造物主必须摧毁被人破坏殆尽的世界

translation.en: So we ourselves must be destroyed.
translation.zh: 因此我们也应该被消灭

translation.en: Not when I look at my sons.
translation.zh: 我的儿子们不该有这种下场
他们渴望的只有爱 难道这样还不够让他们成为好人吗？

translation.en: Isn't that all their hearts need to be good?
translation.zh: 难道这样还不够让他们成为好人吗？

translation.en: METHUSELAH: Who is good? Who is wicked?
translation.zh: 谁是好人？谁又是坏人？ 我怎么知道是非对错？

translation.en: How am I supposed to know what is right?
translation.zh: 我怎么知道是非对错？ 选择在诺亚手中 你我都无权决定

translation.en: That choice is Noah's. Not mine. Not yours.
translation.zh: 选择在诺亚手中 你我都无权决定

translation.en: It sounds like he has made it.
So then you will not help me?
translation.zh: 这么说您是不会帮我了

translation.en: I don't know if I even could.
translation.zh: 我不知道我帮不帮得了你

translation.en: But if I tried, it could cause pain
translation.zh: 就算可以 帮助你可能会带来痛苦
甚至悲剧 到头来选择还是会落在诺亚手中

translation.en: And in the end, it would just come back to Noah again.
translation.zh: 到头来选择还是会落在诺亚手中

translation.en: I want my sons to have children.
translation.zh: 我要我的孩子们生儿育女 我要他们快乐

translation.en: I want them to be happy.
I can't bear to think of them dying alone.
translation.zh: 我无法想像他们孤独老死

translation.en: SOLDIER: Out of the way! Coming through!
It's all right. It's all right. I'm not... I'm not going to hurt you.
translation.zh: 没事的 我不会伤害你

translation.en: I can help you get away.
Well, then, I'll stay a little while.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我就多待一会儿

translation.en: Go and find them and bring them back.
What are you doing down here?
I'm looking for berries. I have a craving.
Come and help me look for them. My eyes aren't as good as they used to be.
translation.zh: 帮我找找 我的视力已经不如以往

translation.en: I have to find Ham. There's time enough for that.

translation.zh: 这里什么也没有 祖父

translation.en: Let me take you to Noah. No.
No need for that. You go now.
translation.zh: 没必要 你可以走了

translation.en: Ten years you've been with my own. With my own family.
translation.zh: 这十年来你和我的家族一起生活

translation.en: Ten years. And you love them?
translation.zh: 十年了 你爱他们吗？

translation.en: And you are now as his own daughter.
Ten years in the shadow of my home,
translation.zh: 这十年来你受我家族庇护 我却没能赐福给你

translation.en: and yet I have never given you my blessing.
You can go now. Go to him.
translation.zh: 你可以走了 去找他吧
我们必须离开 我们必须离开 走吧 快！

translation.en: We have to go. Come on. Now!
translation.zh: 我们必须离开 走吧 快！

translation.en: Why will You not converse with me?
I take life away. As You do!
translation.zh: 也可以夺走生命 就跟你一样！

translation.en: And I am like You, am I not?
translation.zh: 我跟你很像 不是吗？
这场大雨… …想让我们从世界上消失

translation.en: is meant to wash us off the face of this world.
We decide if we live or die.

translation.zh: 只要团结起来便所向披靡！

translation.en: Get it off me, no! Ow!
I won't leave you. I won't!
translation.zh: 我不会离开你 我不会！

translation.en: Protect your mother. Protect them all.
They are upon us. Go inside!
translation.zh: 他们正在逼近 快进去！

translation.en: NAAMEH: Japheth, where are you? SHEM: Ila, I'm here! JAPHETH: Father!
translation.zh: –雅弗 你在哪？ –伊拉 我在这！

translation.en: there must be something we can do.
translation.zh: 一定有方法可以救他们

translation.en: They cannot all be soldiers, Father.
translation.zh: 那些人并非全是士兵 爸爸

translation.en: They are just people. And there's room.
translation.zh: 他们只是凡人 方舟还有空间

translation.en: There is no room for them.
translation.zh: 这里没有容纳他们的空间

translation.en: Soon everything we knew will be gone.
translation.zh: 我们所知的世界很快就要消失

translation.en: All that is left of Creation will lie within these walls.
translation.zh: 创世遗留下来的生命都在这艘船上了

translation.en: just the waters of chaos again.
translation.zh: …只是回到纷乱混沌的状态而已

translation.en: Let me tell you a story.
translation.zh: 我讲一个故事给你们听

translation.en: The first story my father told me,
translation.zh: 这是我父亲告诉我的第一个故事

translation.en: and the first story that I told each of you.
translation.zh: 也是我告诉你们的第一个故事

translation.en: Nothing but the silence of an infinite darkness.
But the breath of The Creator fluttered against
translation.zh: 造物主的气息拂过虚空的表面

translation.en: the face of the void, whispering,
translation.zh: 造物主的气息拂过虚空的表面 轻声说…

translation.en: And then the formless light began to take on substance and shape.
translation.zh: 无形的光开始组成物质并有了形状
接着我们的世界诞生了
一个美丽又脆弱的家园

translation.en: And a great, warming light nurtured its days.
translation.zh: 一道强大温暖的光滋养了白昼

translation.en: And a lesser light ruled the nights.
translation.zh: 一道较小的光统治着黑夜

translation.en: And there was evening. And morning.
And the waters of the world gathered together,
and in their midst emerged dry land.
And the ground put forth the growing things.
A thick blanket of green stretching across all Creation.
translation.zh: 厚厚一层植物遍布大地

translation.en: And the waters, too, teemed with life.
Great creatures of the deep that are no more.
translation.zh: 充斥今日不复存在的奇妙生物

translation.en: Vast multitudes of fish, some of which may still swim beneath these seas.
translation.zh: 鱼种众多 有些可能仍在深海中游动

translation.en: And soon the sky was streaming with birds.
And there was evening. And there was morning. A fifth day.
translation.zh: 黑夜过去 白昼降临 这是第五天

translation.en: Now the whole world was full of living beings.
translation.zh: 现在全世界都充满着生命

translation.en: Everything that creeps, everything that crawls, and every beast that walks upon the ground.
translation.zh: 大地上有各式各样的野兽与爬虫

translation.en: And it was good. It was all good.
translation.zh: 这是好的 全都是好的

translation.en: There was light and air and water and soil, all clean and unspoiled.
translation.zh: 光 空气 水和泥土皆洁净不受污染

translation.en: There were plants and fish and fowl and beast,
translation.zh: 植物和虫鱼鸟兽生活其中

translation.en: each after their own kind. All part of the greater whole. All in their place.
translation.zh: 各从其类 各安其分 各得其所

translation.en: And all was in balance. It was paradise.
translation.zh: 万物平衡 这是乐园

translation.en: A jewel in The Creator's palm.
Then The Creator made Man. And by his side, Woman.
translation.zh: 接着造物主创造了男人 并创造了女人

translation.en: Father and mother of us all.
translation.zh: 他们就是所有人类的父母

translation.en: or hold on to the blessing of light.
But they ate from the forbidden fruit.
And so for the ten generations since Adam, sin
translation.zh: 亚当的子孙到了第十代 罪恶…

translation.en: We broke the world. We did this.
translation.zh: 世界被破坏殆尽 这是我们造成的

translation.en: Air, water, earth, plant, fish, bird and beast.
translation.zh: 水 空气 泥土 植物和虫鱼鸟兽

translation.en: this time there will be no men.
If we were to enter the Garden again,
it would only be to destroy it once more.
translation.zh: 伊甸园就只会再度被摧毁

translation.en: you will bury your mother and I.

translation.zh: 含 你将埋葬他们 雅弗将为你送终

translation.en: Japheth will lay you to rest.
you will be the last man.
And in time you, too, will return to the dust.

translation.zh: 安全无虞 美丽如昔

translation.en: I'm very sorry about that girl.
translation.zh: 那个女孩的事我很抱歉

translation.en: But we have been entrusted with a task
much greater than our own desires.
Does he know I'm here? No, no, no. No.
But he just let her die.
Everything out there must be dead.
translation.zh: 没有生物可以在外面存活

translation.en: It had to be what He wanted.
is how hard this was for you to do
translation.zh: 这件任务对你来说有多艰难

translation.en: as a man who respects life,
a man who loves his children.
And you can put that burden down.
TUBAL-CAIN: If your father found me, he would kill me.
translation.zh: 如果你父亲发现我 一定会杀了我

translation.en: We must be ready, but I am too weak.
translation.zh: 我们一定要做好准备 但我太虚弱了

translation.en: I must get my strength back.
The beasts are precious. There are only two of each.
translation.zh: 这些野兽很珍贵的 每种只有两只

translation.en: And there is only one of me.

translation.zh: 可是这场大雨和所有奇迹

translation.en: all these miracles, are for them.
translation.zh: 可是这场大雨和所有奇迹 都是为了要救它们

translation.en: Your father fills a ship with beasts while children drown.
translation.zh: 你父亲在船上载满野兽 却让孩童溺死

translation.en: He belittles you by telling you you must serve them.
translation.zh: 他要你服侍动物根本贬低了你

translation.en: That is the greatness of men.
When The Creator finished making the sky, the ground, the sea, and this beast,
translation.zh: 造物主创造了天地 海洋和这些野兽后
他想创造出更伟大的东西

translation.en: to take dominion over it and subdue it.
So He made us in His image.
translation.zh: 因此他照着自己的形像创造人

translation.en: We've come to ask for your blessing.
To give our children a future.
translation.zh: 求他给我们的孩子一个未来

translation.en: Have you any idea what you've done?
translation.zh: 你知不知道你干了什么好事？

translation.en: All those lives! All those people!
translation.zh: 这么多的生命！这么多的人！

translation.en: Do you know what this forces me to do?
translation.zh: 你知道接下来我被迫要做什么事吗？
我做不到！ 请别让我这么做！

translation.en: Tell me I don't need to do this!
Have I not done everything that You asked of me?
translation.zh: 你要我做的事 我哪一件没做到？ 难道这样还不够吗？

translation.en: Why do You not answer me?
The Creator smiles on our child.
translation.zh: 造物主对我们的孩子露出了笑容

translation.en: The rains have stopped because of your child, yes,
translation.zh: 雨的确是因为你们的孩子而停了

translation.en: If your child is a boy,
he will replace Japheth, last man.
translation.zh: 他会代替雅弗成为最后一名人类

translation.en: who could mature into a mother,
If you should bear a girl,
in the moment of her birth, I will cut her down.
translation.zh: 她一出生我就会亲手结束她的生命
什么也没有 连泥土都没沾上

translation.en: You have food and water for how long? Weeks?
translation.zh: 你们准备的食物和水能撑多久？ 几个星期？

translation.en: Wait until the bird finds land. Please.
translation.zh: 至少等鸟儿找到陆地 拜托
雅弗 再让它去一趟

translation.en: He's too tired. Then wake another.
Please. One that can find us a home.
translation.zh: 拜托了 让鸟儿帮我们找一个家

translation.en: NAAMEH: They will die out there.
And let you kill their child?
translation.zh: 然后让你杀死他们的孩子？
我才该被惩罚 诺亚！

translation.en: The child is not being punished.
It's not something I want to do.
It's something I have to do.

translation.zh: 那是个婴儿啊 诺亚
如果你一意孤行 你会失去你的儿子们 失去伊拉

translation.en: you will lose your sons, you will lose Ila,
translation.zh: 你会失去你的儿子们 失去伊拉

translation.en: And I have followed you everywhere. Through everything.
translation.zh: 我追随你的脚步 与你同甘共苦

translation.en: When everyone was dead, I forgave you.
translation.zh: 所有人都死了的时候 我原谅了你

translation.en: I was ready to die with you.
Boy or girl, I will never forgive!
translation.zh: 不管是男婴女婴 我都不会原谅你！

translation.en: And you will die alone! Not just alone, but hated!
translation.zh: 你会孤独地死去！ 不仅孤独 还被怨恨！
被每个你所爱的人怨恨！

translation.en: I don't know if I can.
And now he plots to kill your brother's firstborn.
translation.zh: 现在还想杀了你哥哥的骨肉

translation.en: You want your sister to die on the seas?
translation.zh: 你想让你姐姐死在海上吗？

translation.en: A man isn't ruled by the heavens.
A man is ruled by his will.
translation.zh: 而是由自己的意志主宰

translation.en: You take care of that baby.
We'll see each other in the new world.
I thought that's why He chose you.
translation.zh: 我以为这是他选择你的原因

translation.en: He chose me because He knew I would complete the task,
translation.zh: 他选择我是因为他知道我能完成任务

translation.en: You're all right. SHEM: Japheth, stand back.
You're all right, Ila. You're safe here.
translation.zh: 你不会有事 伊拉 你在这里很安全
你的孩子要出生了 伊拉

translation.en: Don't think about anything else. (ILA WAILING)
They're awake! They're eating each other!
It's not possible for them to have woken up without our help.
translation.zh: 没有我们帮忙 它们不可能醒来

translation.en: He will not touch our daughters.
translation.zh: 我不会让他伤害我们的女儿

translation.en: TUBAL-CAIN: I should have killed you when I killed your father.
translation.zh: 我杀死你父亲时早该连你一并解决

translation.en: The evils of mankind will not live in this new Eden.
translation.zh: 新的伊甸园不容人类的邪恶存在
离我们远一点！让我们自己过活！

translation.en: The ark, the beasts, and all of your women are now mine.
translation.zh: 方舟 野兽和你们的女人… …都由我来接收

translation.en: I will build a new world
The Creator has not forgotten us.
translation.zh: 造物主还没有遗忘我们
你不能把两个孩子都杀了

translation.en: He sent us what we need.
translation.zh: 他送来我们所需的东西
她们是我的女儿！ –你的孙女！ –没人能阻止我

translation.en: Your grandchildren! I will not be stopped.
I know I cannot stop you, but they're crying!
translation.zh: 我知道我阻止不了你 但她们在哭！ 请别让她们哭着死去

translation.en: Please don't let them die crying.
Please, just let them be at peace.
translation.zh: 拜托 让她们能好好安息

translation.en: ♪ To wrap you in His sheltering wings
♪ Your Father is the healing wind
translation.zh: 你的父亲是那疗愈的风

translation.en: You do not need to see this. I will hold them.
I'm glad that it begins again with you.
translation.zh: 我很高兴人类的香火由你延续下去

translation.en: Maybe we'll learn to be kind.

translation.zh: 有些伤害是无法弥补的

translation.en: I looked down at those two little girls,
translation.zh: 当我低头看着那两个小女娃

translation.en: and all I had in my heart was love.
Then why are you alone, Noah?
translation.zh: 诺亚 那你为什么要独自过活？

translation.en: Why are you separated from your family?
And I failed all of you.
He chose you for a reason, Noah.
translation.zh: 诺亚 他选择你是有原因的 他让你看清人的邪恶

translation.en: He showed you the wickedness of man
translation.zh: 他让你看清人的邪恶 知道你不会视而不见

translation.en: and knew you would not look away.
But then you saw goodness, too.
translation.zh: 也让你看到人良善的一面 选择在你手中 因为这是他的旨意

translation.en: The choice was put in your hands because He put it there.
translation.zh: 选择在你手中 因为这是他的旨意

translation.en: He asked you to decide if we were worth saving.
translation.zh: 他让你决定我们是否值得救赎

translation.en: He has given us a second chance.
translation.zh: 他给了我们第二次机会

translation.en: Help us to do better this time.
and placed the world in his care.
To my father, then to me, and to my sons,
translation.zh: 先是我的父亲 再给我… …然后是我的儿子们…

translation.en: That birthright is now passed to you,
translation.zh: 现在这项任务传承给你们…
